mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT (P_NUM, P_NAME, P_COST, P_IMAGE_NAME, P_IMAGE_PATH, P_CONTENT, P_MA_DATE, P_EX_DATE, P_CAPACITY, P_TYPE, P_CATEGORY) VALUES (PRODUCT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{pName}, #{pCost}, #{imageName}, #{imagePath}, #{pContent}, #{pMaDate}, #{pExDate}, #{pCapacity}, #{pType}, #{pCategory})
mapper.delete: UPDATE PRODUCT SET P_DEL='Y' WHERE P_NUM=#{pNum}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY P_NUM DESC)AS ROW_NUM, PRODUCT.* FROM PRODUCT WHERE P_DEL='N') WHERE ROW_NUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRODUCT WHERE P_DEL='N'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRODUCT
AND P_NUM LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND P_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND P_DEL='N'
